method.text: Lightly grease an 18 cm fluted sandwich tin.
Fit the metal chopping blade into the food processor and turn to minimum speed. Drop in the biscuits through the feed tube until coarsely chopped. Turn off the processor.
In a pan, heat together the sugar and butter until the butter has just melted. Take off the heat and stir in remaining ingredients.
Carefully pour the cocoa powder mixture down the feed tube and process until well mixed together but still chunky.
Turn the mixture into the prepared tin and smooth the surface. Leave to set in the fridge.
Once set, decorate with the cherries, orange rind, sifted cocoa and icing sugar.
